code: import{GET_ALL_POSTS}from"../actions/post.actions";var initialState={};export default function allPostsReducer(){var state=arguments.length>0&&arguments[0]!==undefined?arguments[0]:initialState;var action=arguments.length>1?arguments[1]:undefined;switch(action.type){case GET_ALL_POSTS:return action.playload;default:return state;}}
